title: Talos TGA Execution Log Entry
description: Schema for append-only execution tracelog entries with normative hashing requirements.

trace_id.description: Unique UUID for the trace execution.

sequence_number.description: Monotonically increasing sequence number for the trace.

payload.description: The event payload (tool args, results, plan steps).

prev_entry_digest.description: SHA-256 Hex Digest of the previous entry (or 64 zeros for seq=0).

entry_digest.description: The SHA-256 JCS hash of this entry. Preimage: JCS({trace_id, seq, type, payload, ts, prev_digest}).
